mapper.select: SELECT ID ,NAME ,PHONE ,POSITION ,JOIN_DATE ,STATUS ,CASE WHEN OCCUPATION = 'W' THEN '직장인' ELSE '학생' END AS OCCUPATION ,CASE WHEN GRADE = '1' THEN '정기' ELSE '명예' END AS GRADE ,CASE WHEN TEAM = 'WHITE' THEN '백' ELSE '청' END AS TEAM ,CREATED ,UPDATED FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'O' ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID ,NAME ,PHONE ,POSITION ,JOIN_DATE ,STATUS ,OCCUPATION ,GRADE ,TEAM ,CREATED ,UPDATED FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'O' AND ID = #{id}
SELECT ID ,NAME ,PHONE ,POSITION ,JOIN_DATE ,STATUS ,OCCUPATION ,GRADE ,TEAM ,CREATED ,UPDATED FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'O' AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name})
